text: Additionally , ensure that pagination begins from page 1 — page 0 must be explicitly disallowed to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools .
— page 0 must be explicitly disallowed to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools
to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools
A tactile page break marker " ⠿ ⠿ " must be inserted at the end of each page to assist with both manual review and automated parsing by assistive hardware .
to assist with both manual review and automated parsing by assistive hardware
placed on a new line following the final line of each page
following the final line of each page
Failure to implement may result in unreadable output and increased user error .
